title: Hedychium spicatum
Vernacular name: English- Spiked ginger lily </br> Hindi- Sandharlika </br> Gujarati- Kapurkachli </br> Sanskrit- Shati </br>
Chemical Constituents: α-pinene, β-pinene, limonene, camphor, linalyl acetate, β-terpineol, β-caryophyllene, benzyl cinnamate, benzyl acetate, γ-terpinene
Therapeutic uses: Used in treating inflammation, pain, asthma, foul breath, vomiting, diarrhoea, bronchitis, hiccough and blood diseases
